title: India's coronavirus infections cross 18 million; record number of daily deaths
content:
1. India's coronavirus infections cross 18 million; record number of daily deaths  Reuters India
  2. India's official death toll surges past 200000 as the country's healthcare system collapses  DW News
  3. India grieves 200,000 dead with many more probably uncounted  The Associated Press
  4. True number of COVID cases and deaths in India likely far greater than official figures | ABC News  ABC News (Australia)
  5. India Adds Another 375K Virus Cases, Tries to Vaccinate More  U.S. News & World Report
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
